tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is really good but everything else is bad. Everytime we take appointment, we feel like we are walk-in patient. We have to wait for long time (sometime hours) even after taking appointment. This is not due to doctor being busy, it's purely because of receptionist doesn't know how to take care of appointments. She is very very rude when you talk to her. She sends one patient from her register appointments and one from practo etc, so the time given to you is pointless. This happens everytime without fail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: There is no word limit to express my gratitude to Dr. Aparna for being such a wonderful Doctor. She is an expert in her area of treatment. Her friendliness is evident from the fact that she was available everytime I pinged, without getting irritated. She stood by our side whenever we needed her. She has kept her commitment everytime. She prefers to do Normal Delivery unless it is extremelly important to go for a c section. As already stated, words cannot limit her excellence. *** *** ***** ** *** ** *********************** *** **** ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.Aparna Vishnumurthy is a friendly doctor and her advise is excellent. She responds at late night during emergency and her interaction with patients is nice and humble. I am fully happy with her, that to during pandamic situation, she treated me very well.  The fee and other charges are reasonable compared to other clinics/hospitals, hence  I recommend for others also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Extremely satisfied with her Swift and friendly nature. She is always  supportive to the patient and and gives a very transparent picture of the tests and it's reports. In case of emergency she never puts pressure on the patient, instead she gets ready from her side. We will never look for another gynecologist in Bangalore and very happy to recommend her to all my friends and family.

tags: None
review: ********* ******* Highly recommended. She takes care of the patient and is available all time whenever u call. She also takes the pain to go extra miles to see that patient party is comfortable with the hospital. Very professional at work and quick decision maker.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to thank Dr.Aparna for supporting me throughout my pregnancy and I felt comfortable to talk to her, She is very friendly and She took care of all the detailing’s required for a smooth and safe delivery. She understands the mindset of the patient and clarifies all their doubts. I am happy to share that we are blessed with the baby boy with normal delivery. Thank you mam for being there whenever I needed guidance and care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
About Clinic: Doesn't matter if you book the appointment in advance, you will be treated as walk-in patient and register your name in waiting list at the register there. normal waiting time is about 45 min. Bring the cash with you because POS card machine is not reliable and most of the time it doesn't work. you will get the payment receipt only if you asked for it.
Doctor: She is very friendly and explain the all the details, you can contact her  over the phone if you are getting treated by her. but treatment satisfaction is the area she can improve, you always feel a need of 2nd opinion because somehow she is not 100% able to convince you  that  you are getting the ***** treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** first me and my wife and our whole family want's to say big THANKS to mam.
Its our second child and this is possible because of Aparna mam, there were so many complications for my wife and we were so confused to make decisions for second child...we follow during pregnancy whatever Dr. Said and we made full faith an trust on her from day 1 pregnancy to till birth of my child..
We will highly recommend Dr. APARNA for any Gyno related problems or advice..
She listen the each and every problem of patients very calm and advice as per that...

tags: Wait time,
review: Though we booked through practo, we were asked to write our names when we reached and wait for all the patients who arrived before us. When we asked, we were told since they are are not charging through practo they will not consider the appointment made through it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is Friendly...Every thing z good with Blossom..But needto be  shift Hospital..thats better for all of us

review:
We found Dr Aparna Patil as a good doctor and with attentive, analytical, calm, cooperative, decisive, energetic, ethical, friendly, mature, observant, responsible, skillful, trustworthy, vigilant, and wise.
It's really admirable how she always see her patients through from conception to completion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Prenatal Checkup, Prenatal Care,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Dr. Aparna is very patient and always cheerful and takes the time to discuss your situation and to clear all doubts and questions you may have. She is a **** ************* *** understanding healthcare provider. I had a tension free and smooth pregnancy and normal delivery, all thanks to Dr. Aparna.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Highly recommended for pregnancy care & Fertility issues.

Doctor never put you in trouble by giving unnecessary medicines or treatments,She does everything in step by step process and never in a hurry,Detailed Explanation, Friendliness & Very much down to earth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Dr. Aparna is very caring to her all patients.She always explain all the queries and spent quality time to her patient.We engaged with her from the pregnancy planning to delivery till date.We really appreciate her contribution to our life.
Thank you Dr. Aparna Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She is very friendly, having excellent experience in her area and gives proper guidance. She had supported very well during delivery, given proper instructions to nurses and came on time at Hospital and spent more than five hours with proper monitoring. Delivery was normal. We are very thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience was with doctor was so fantastic and she was able to analyse my health issue so quickly. We have seen the result in just two month and I am able to get conceive in just two months. Now I have second baby so I am very much greatful to the doctor for helping me to make my family complete.

review: Dr Aparna is very co-operative and friendly.we are highly satisfied from her. She always taken follow up with her patients through wats app or messages,we would recommend her for pregnancy check up and post pregnancy care.She waited in labor room with lot of patience for normal delivery to happen.Many thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My whole experience with Dr.Aparna was very good. Very friendly, she will not prescribe unnecessary tests or medicines .

She will make your whole journey for pregnancy easy and happy with out any complications like big hospitals who scare you with so many things .

Very professional and good attitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aparna is very friendly, doesn't suggest unnecessary investigation and medications. She is very empathetic, kept boosting the morale for normal delivery. She is readily available on phone... never faced issues contacting her in case of emergency. Her support made my prenatal journey really comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ***** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ****** doctor was very patient with me, understood my medical history and advised to proceed with natural conception. Once I conceived, doctor took all precautions to ensure safety of the pregnancy. The doctor was right with me through labour and ensured I delivered normally. 
I have never felt more comfortable with any other doctor.
